app.title: Avocat-AI Francophone
app.commandPlaceholder: Press / to open the command palette

commandPalette.title: Command palette
commandPalette.subtitle: Navigate quickly or trigger an action.
commandPalette.keyboardHint: Use ↑ and ↓ to move between results, Enter to run a command.

newResearch.label: New research
newResearch.description: Open the Research view and ask a new question.

upload.label: Upload document
upload.description: Open the corpus manager to add an authoritative source.

openWorkspace.label: Workspace
openWorkspace.description: Return to the dashboard and launch quick actions.

openDrafting.label: Drafting
openDrafting.description: Open templates and the clause comparison tools.

openCitations.label: Browse sources
openCitations.description: Use the authority browser and version diff viewer.

openHitl.label: Human review
openHitl.description: Manage the HITL queue and approve high-risk answers.

openCorpus.label: Corpus & Sources
openCorpus.description: Manage allowlists and monitor ingestion health.

openTrust.label: Trust Center
openTrust.description: Review transparency metrics, SLO snapshots, and published evidence.

install.title: Install Avocat-AI
install.body: Add the app to your home screen for faster access and offline-friendly workflows.
install.success: Avocat-AI is ready on your device.
install.unavailable: Installation is unavailable on this device.

releaseNotes.title: What's new
items: Service worker installs now wait for your approval with documented release notes.
Regulator digest alerts map to your Avocat-AI profile notifications.
Offline queue telemetry is scoped per user to respect compliance controls.
releaseNotes.digestDescription: Enable regulator digests tied to your authenticated profile.
releaseNotes.digestEnabled: Digest alerts will follow your profile preferences.
releaseNotes.digestUnavailable: Notifications are unavailable on this device.

confidential.title: Confidential mode enabled
confidential.body: Web search is disabled, local caches are cleared, and a privacy veil blurs previews to limit exposure.

enable.label: Enable confidential mode
enable.description: Mask sensitive previews and restrict online tools.

disable.label: Disable confidential mode
disable.description: Restore web search and secure local caching.

status.enabled: Confidential mode on — web search is suspended.
status.disabled: Confidential mode off — online tools are available again.

compliance.title: Compliance acknowledgements required
compliance.description: Complete the CEPEJ consent and Council of Europe treaty disclosures to unlock agent runs and exports.
compliance.councilRequired: Acknowledge Council of Europe treaty disclosures version {version}.
compliance.error: Unable to record the acknowledgement. Try again.
compliance.offline: You appear to be offline. Reconnect to refresh compliance status.
compliance.clearDescription: All mandatory acknowledgements have been recorded for this workspace.
compliance.footer: Your responses are logged for CEPEJ / Council of Europe compliance.
compliance.prompt: Compliance acknowledgements pending. Use the banner above to review and confirm.

research.noOfficialSource: Cannot verify an official source. Please trigger human review.
research.languageWarning: The French version is a translation. Arabic is legally binding.
research.canadaLanguageNotice: In Québec and Canada, French and English versions carry equal legal force.
research.switzerlandLanguageNotice: In Switzerland, review the French and German versions whenever available.
research.rwandaLanguageNotice: In Rwanda, French, English, and Kinyarwanda editions of the Official Gazette all carry equal legal force.

bilingual.label: Official versions
bilingual.note: Switch between the official French and English versions when reviewing bilingual statutes.

compliance.title: Compliance issues
compliance.description: Resolve the following items before exporting or sharing guidance.
compliance.friaRequired: A formal FRIA assessment is required.
compliance.friaReasonFallback: Document the FRIA rationale before proceeding.
compliance.cepejDefaultDetail: Review transparency obligations and risk scoring.
compliance.statuteDefaultDetail: Identify a controlling statute before continuing.

statuteViolations.first_rule_not_statute: The first cited rule is not a statute.

compliance.resolvedDetail: No outstanding FRIA, CEPEJ, or disclosure tasks remain.

confidential.banner: Confidential mode: only trusted internal and allowlisted sources are consulted and sensitive features are limited.
confidential.voiceDisabled: Voice dictation is unavailable in confidential mode.
confidential.ocrDisabled: Camera capture is unavailable in confidential mode.

research.jurisdictionNote: Adjust the jurisdiction when needed. Badges surface EU, OHADA, bilingual, tri-lingual, or Maghreb layers.

readingModes.label: Reading modes

descriptions.research: Full IRAC analysis with trust details.
descriptions.brief: Condensed summary for memos and briefings.
descriptions.evidence: Focus on authoritative sources and verification.

readingModes.briefLead: Shareable overview for clients or team members.
readingModes.briefRulesEmpty: No primary rules have been identified yet.
readingModes.evidenceModeSubtitle: Review each authoritative source and refresh snapshots when necessary.
readingModes.evidenceEmpty: No authoritative citations are available yet.

trust.title: Why you can trust this answer
trust.description: Summary of automated checks, official sources, and compliance warnings.
trust.verificationHitl: Escalated to human review for final validation.
trust.allowlistClean: All citations come from approved domains.
trust.bindingAll: All referenced rules are marked as binding.
trust.sourcesEmpty: Sources will appear after the first answer.
trust.planNew: New plan generated for this request.
trust.manualHitlReason: Manual review requested from the trust panel.
trust.hitlRequestFailed: Unable to request human review. Try again shortly.

bilingual.label: Official bilingual versions
bilingual.note: In Québec and Canada the French and English versions carry equal legal authority. Use the citations list to open each official text.

rwanda.label: Rwanda official versions
rwanda.description: Choose which language to review when cross-checking provisions.
rwanda.note: French, English, and Kinyarwanda editions of the Official Gazette are equally binding. Flag any material mismatch for human review.

voice.unsupported: Voice dictation is not available on this device.

ocr.error: We couldn't read the text. Try a clearer photo.

outbox.title: Offline queue
outbox.offline: Requests will be submitted once you reconnect.
outbox.queued: Research saved for later while offline.
outbox.stillOffline: Still offline. Retry when the network is back.

trust.title: Trust Center
trust.description: Operational transparency, service commitments, and governance documentation for clients and regulators.
trust.publicationsDescription: Access published policies, runbooks, and official notices from the Avocat-AI team.

workspace.heroSubtitle: Trigger a fresh IRAC analysis or pick up ongoing matters with real-time risk and reviewer visibility.
workspace.planDescription: The agent records every step, tool call, and piece of evidence consulted. High-risk outputs escalate to human review automatically.
workspace.planRisk: Risk monitoring and HITL escalation baked in.
workspace.planLatency: Target latency < 150 ms for common actions.
workspace.planGovernance: Full audit trail of citations and decisions.
workspace.jurisdictionHint: Auto-detected from the prompt. Adjust as needed.
workspace.jurisdictionEmpty: No jurisdictions registered for this organisation yet.
workspace.recentMattersEmpty: Matters analysed by the agent will appear here with their status and risk level.
workspace.hitlEmpty: No matters waiting for human review.

desk.title: Process navigator & multi-agent desk
desk.subtitle: Launch guided playbooks, switch personas, and manage compliance tooling without leaving the workspace.

playbooks.title: Navigator playbooks
playbooks.subtitle: Pre-flight checklists with telemetry, guardrails, and launch questions.

quickActions.title: Quick actions
quickActions.subtitle: Jump directly to matters, plan snapshots, or trust dashboards.

personas.title: Specialist personas
personas.subtitle: Shift into a persona with scoped permissions and guardrails.

toolbelt.title: Agent toolbelt
toolbelt.subtitle: Status of each mode and compliance shortcuts.

chatkit.title: Live Chat Sessions
chatkit.subtitle: Monitor ChatKit threads, stream events, and escalate to human reviewers when the agent signals risk.
chatkit.escalateDescription: Send to a reviewer and pause automation until the decision is recorded.
chatkit.emptyStateDetail: ChatKit sessions will appear here once a workspace launches a live agent thread.

defaultTasks.intakeDescription: Collecting documents and classifying risk signals.
defaultTasks.analysisDescription: Retrieving authorities, drafting responses, and scoring risk.
defaultTasks.reviewDescription: Awaiting reviewer confirmation before delivering the answer.

navigator.title: Guided process navigator
navigator.subtitle: Track jurisdiction workflows, compliance guardrails, and human hand-offs for each persona.
navigator.empty: Navigator runs will appear once an operator launches a guided workflow.

drafting.title: Drafting suite
drafting.templatesDescription: Pick a vetted template or launch an assisted draft with authoritative sourcing.
drafting.smartDraftDescription: Start from a prompt or uploaded document. The agent enforces cite-or-refuse guardrails.
drafting.promptPlaceholder: Describe the goal (jurisdiction, procedure, key clauses)…
drafting.redlineDescription: Compare versions, accept/reject tracked changes, and request explanations.
drafting.empty: No draft yet. Generate a document to see suggestions.
drafting.templatesError: Unable to load templates. Please try again.
drafting.templateSummaryFallback: Generic structure – send to human review before use.

redlineViewer.summarySubtitle: Track accepted, pending, and high-risk changes before final approval.
redlineViewer.flaggedHelp: Some clauses require human review before signature.
redlineViewer.detailSubtitle: Clause-by-clause analysis ready for HITL review.
redlineViewer.noEntries: No tracked changes yet for this draft.

matters.title: Matter management
matters.empty: Select a matter to view its deadlines, documents, and risk profile.

citationsBrowser.title: Authority browser
citationsBrowser.noDiff: Select two snapshots to display the comparison.
citationsBrowser.diffInstructions: Additions are highlighted in green, removals in red.
citationsBrowser.empty: No authorities found. Adjust filters or rerun ingestion.

hitl.title: Human-in-the-loop
hitl.metricsSubtitle: Track the queue, escalations, and bias indicators
hitl.timelineSubtitle: Track reviewer actions and outcomes for this HITL item.
hitl.timelineEmpty: No actions have been recorded yet.
hitl.noCitations: No citations were captured for this run.

corpus.title: Corpus & sources
corpus.noSummary: No summary available for this document yet.
corpus.residencyHint: Uploads use the active residency zone to enforce storage policies.

admin.title: Administration
admin.launchReadinessSubtitle: Track readiness signals before enabling production launches.
admin.launchReadinessScoreHint: Composite score based on vitals, documentation, and reviews.
admin.launchReadinessVitalsHint: {needs} needs improvement • {poor} poor vitals in last 7 days.
admin.launchReadinessActionFallback: All actions are complete. Monitor telemetry for new tasks.
admin.launchReadinessNotesFallback: No notes have been recorded for this launch yet.
admin.empty: Organization settings appear here based on your role.
admin.metricsDescription: Monitor citation precision, HITL workload, and ingestion health across your teams.
admin.ingestionHint: Success vs failures over the last 24h
admin.provenanceJurisdictionDescription: Binding languages, residency envelopes, and identifier coverage per jurisdiction.
admin.evaluationDescription: Acceptance thresholds, coverage, and per-jurisdiction telemetry for regression monitoring.
admin.evaluationMaghrebHint: Banners must display for MA/TN/DZ when translations are non-binding.
admin.policyDescription: Download the signed responsibility, incident, and retention policies.
admin.policyCoe: Council of Europe AI Convention alignment
admin.policyEvidenceHint: Archive these signed documents for external audits.
admin.policyChangeHint: Change control procedure and Go/No-Go validation.
admin.policySupportHint: Support and SLO commitments shared with clients.
admin.policyGoNoGo: Go / No-Go checklists and FRIA attestations.
admin.retrievalDescription: Track File Search contribution, allowlist compliance, and the most cited domains.
admin.sloDescription: Track uptime, reviewer response times, and retrieval guarantees shared with regulators.
admin.sloHitlHint: Median reviewer turnaround on high-priority incidents.
admin.sloRetrievalHint: Latency for hybrid queries (File Search + allowlisted web).
admin.sloCitationHint: Allowlisted domain adherence during the measurement window.

operations.title: Operations & readiness
operations.description: Stay ahead of incidents, the change log, and production Go/No-Go criteria.

admin.identifierDescription: Track ELI/ECLI metadata and Akoma Ntoso encoding across jurisdictions.
admin.toolHint: Latency and failure rate per tool (rolling 7 days).
admin.ssoDescription: Connect your identity provider via SAML or OIDC. Saved connections map groups to Avocat-AI roles.
admin.scimDescription: Generate SCIM tokens to automate user provisioning from your identity provider.
admin.scimLastToken: Copy the token now; it is shown only once.
admin.ipDescription: Restrict admin access to trusted network ranges.
admin.ipCidrRequired: Provide a valid CIDR before saving.
admin.auditDescription: Track administrative actions for compliance reviews.
admin.devicesDescription: Review active sessions, attestation status, and revoke devices that are no longer trusted.
